scripts.installDep: concurrently " npm run install-backend-dep" " npm run install-frontend-dep"
scripts.run-build: concurrently " npm run build-backend" " npm run build-frontend"
scripts.run-start: concurrently " npm run start-backend" " npm run start-frontend"
scripts.test: concurrently " npm run run-test-backend && npm run run-test-frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run installDep && npm run test && npm run run-build && npm run run-start
scripts.scratch-start: npm install && concurrently "npm run installDep && npm run test && npm run run-build && npm run run-start
